forum.content:
你好！很高興認識大家
想來打一篇英文的自介
希望真心的妳能看到我！
Live is very funny
l Like every moment
Nice to meet you everyone
Except work I enjoy life more
- - - - - - - - - - - - - -
If you know what is I talking about,and you want to know where am I,follow my feel you can see me.
- - - - - - - - - - - - - -
you may feel my write is wrong
um......sometimes my word is freestyle
chinese or English l like all of them
he or she can become my friend
everytime I waiting
20 to 26 girl is my favorite
6 is my lucky number
forum.title: know you see me~
